event.title: Bristol Machine Learning #2
event.description:
Welcome to the second Bristol Machine Learning Meetup! Since I'm still in the process of organizing speakers and confirming the venue for the first proper one, let's meet socially again!

I hope some new people will show up, also if anyone wants to do a talk, feel free to PM me or bring it up during the meet-up. The next one is planned in April and is going to be hosted at Dyson Bristol office.

For now, same place as the last time for logistics and simplicity.

If you have any questions or suggestions feel free to message me!
